entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
entry.content:
Aug 27, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 26, 17:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/08/2024 16:00 UTC
End time : 27/08/2024 23:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.
This maintenance is expected to impact performance for Accounts services, including the Console, User Accounting, Provisioning and Billing, although, services will remain available at all times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service.
This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.

End time : 23/08/2024 14:30 UTC

The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
